prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a handsome asian man, muscular build, intense neutral expression, silver-rimmed glasses, spiky black hair, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: subtle skin pores, defined arms, dynamic light refracting on glasses, realistic fabric weave on gi, individual hair strands, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, flat lighting, low quality, bad anatomy, (human face:1.2), doll, blurry face, (no glasses:1.2), messy hair, long hair
